author: whaughton
title: Manchester City have broken FA anti-doping rules THREE times in fives months since arrival of Pep Guardiola

locations.name: pep guardiola dopey city manchester city

text:
Dopey City Manchester City have broken FA anti-doping rules THREE times in fives months since arrival of Pep Guardiola 
Written reasons for Manchester City breaches of FA anti-doping rules published this week include giving incorrect address of players and club giving players day off without FA knowledge by Warren Haughton 26th March 2017, 5:39 pm Updated: 26th March 2017, 6:48 pm
